content:
A client once gave my father
several boxes of videotapes.
I'd like to know what kind of <color=#8AAB4B>movies</color> you enjoy.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-电影-1004夙夜_选项闲聊

Oh! The store has plenty of them.
Once I find these videotapes,
you can come over and watch them.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家喜好闲聊-电影-1004夙夜_选项闲聊

content:
A client showed me "Beloved," winner of countless awards,
So why weren't there any explanations?
And why wouldn't anyone listen to explanations?

content:
Like "Regret," a black and white film.
A simple antique bed where everyone who sleeps on it
shares the same dream.{短暂停}Oh, never mind.
